summary:
Since it is my first mod, don't expect too much. If you have suggestions or wishes for me I'd appreciate them! 

This mod is changing the Thieves Guild Headquarter.
descriptionHtml:
I really like the Thieves Guild Headquarter but i was missing a few things:

- Arcane Enchanter
- Private Room
- Brightness
- Mannequins 

My aim is to keep it realistic, not to make some overpowered player home. thats why it should be basic. 

Version 1.0: 

So I've relocated the Alchemy Lab and added a Arcane Enchanter in the hallway to the Ragged Flagon.

Since the treasureroom was quite useless i decided to use it as a private room. First of all i removed the old furniture which contains emty chests and so on.

I've added a few chests and a lot of mannequins. Also a king sized bed in the center.

In addition to this ive placed some lights all over the HQ so it became brighter.

I hope you like it, comments are welcome.

Version 2.0:

I've added a new room in this version. It is located on the left side when you go to the archery room.

The new room contains:
- 7 Mannequins
- a campfire
- a kingsized bed
- animal trophies at the walls 
- 2 guild chests
- 1 large chest
- 1 table enchanter
- 1 alchemy lab
- a few barrels for storage

Version 2.1:

- added 2 weapon display cases
- added a door to the room

Version 2.2:

- added 2 new roooms
-> alchemy room
-> pool room
- updated mainroom

the main room now has 
- a cooking spot near the campfire
- a table with food to harvest, like salmon, chicken and pheasant
- several meat at the table
- i relocated the alchemy lab to the alchemy room
- i also relocated the mannequins, so you can use the hallway properly

the alchemy room contains:
- several shrooms wich can be harvested
- alchemy lab
- chicken stall, with chicken nests
- campfire

a pool room 
- contains a lot of water
- a statue of nightingale

Version 2.3:

- added a large weapon rack behind the mannequins to store your weapons
- removed brightness in the hallway to the red flagon

i think this mod has so far everything you need - suggestions are welcome! :)

Bugs:
- you can't place the ghostblade at the weapon rack
- lightening bug -> objects are black until you get closer
author: RFLX
